Actions.Name: Run query and list results
Actions.Description: Returns each row as its own object. Use this action when you want to work with each row separately in the rest of the workflow.

Actions.Name: Run query and list results V2 (Preview)
Actions.Description: Returns each row as its own object. Use this action when you want to work with each row separately in the rest of the workflow.

Actions.Name: Run query and visualize results
Actions.Description: Returns all rows in the result set as a single formatted object. Use this action when you want to use the result set together in the rest of the workflow.

Actions.Name: Run query and visualize results V2 (Preview)
Actions.Description: Returns all rows in the result set as a single formatted object. Use this action when you want to use the result set together in the rest of the workflow.
